mapper.select: select notice_id, title, contents, summary, upload_key, date_format(register_time, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') as register_time, date_format(update_time, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') as update_time from notice where notice_id = #{noticeId}

choose.when: summary like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') or title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')
MATCH(summary) AGAINST(CONCAT(#{keyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE) or MATCH(title) AGAINST(CONCAT(#{keyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE)
MATCH(summary) AGAINST(CONCAT(#{noticeSearchPagingDto.keyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE) or MATCH(title) AGAINST(CONCAT(#{noticeSearchPagingDto.keyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE)
